thoughts: Thinks of the disapproving glares of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ex-Clanmates while {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/train/trains}
Will never forget the looks of scorn on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates faces
Resents the Clan that exiled {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is wondering if {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} punishment will ever end
Claims that StarClan itself is against {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Hisses at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Clanmates
Is used to being alone
Uses dirty tricks in battle
Has no sense of justice
Scowls while watching the Clan continue on as if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} never there at all
Counts {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} crimes against c_n
Hopes c_n will collapse into chaos
Enjoys the darkness of the Place of No Stars
Is telling lies about c_n with a blank face
Knows what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did
Is daydreaming about killing the leader that banished {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is trying to find ways to outsmart even the wittiest Clan cats
Can't even bare to look at the Clanmates {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} used to think of as friends
Finds {PRONOUN/m_c/self} thinking about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} life in c_n
Is imagining the tree {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} clawing at is one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ex-Clanmates
Trains extra hard, waiting for an opportunity to get {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} revenge
Knows {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} right to do what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did
Wants to make {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old leader pay for exiling {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is watching {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan with scorn, hoping for an opportunity to get back at them
Is cursing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan
Truly believes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} misunderstood
Wonders if what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did was truly right...
Is begging StarClan for forgiveness
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could apologize to c_n for everything {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} done
Is deeply regretting what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did to get exiled and end up here
